Class ByteUtil

      • toBytes

        public static Bytes toBytes(org.apache.accumulo.core.data.ByteSequence bs)
        Converts from ByteSequence to Bytes. If the ByteSequenc has a backing array, that array (and the buffer's offset and limit) are used. Otherwise, a new backing array is created.
        Parameters:
        bs - ByteSequence
        Returns:
        Bytes object
